title: Document Issues
description: Handle problematic documents with quality assessments and updates.

steps.title: Initial scan
steps.description: AI identifies missing pages, corrupt uploads, or low confidence.
steps.narration: Document scanner flags issues before reviewers open the file.

steps.title: Issue queue
steps.description: Team routes the file to specialists who request corrections.
steps.narration: Specialists send a corrected document request to the applicant.

steps.title: Re-upload & verify
steps.description: Applicant uploads fix, AI revalidates signatures and data.
steps.narration: The application returns with clean files and updated confidence.

steps.title: Release from hold
steps.description: System clears blocks and reinserts application into queue.
steps.narration: Application rejoins the review pipeline with a clean audit trail.
